cards.question: 唉
meaning: interjection or grunt of agreement or recognition (e.g. yes, it's me!)

cards.question: 班主任
meaning: teacher in charge of a class

cards.question: 棒
meaning: classifier for legs of a relay race

cards.question: 背
meaning: the back of a body or object

cards.question: 毕竟
meaning: when all is said and done

cards.question: 丙
meaning: third of 10 heavenly stems 十天干
letter "C" or roman "III" in list "A, B, C"

cards.question: 采取
meaning: to adopt or carry out (measures, policies, course of action)

cards.question: 残疾
meaning: deformity on a person or animal

cards.question: 曾经
meaning: (past tense marker used before verb or clause)

cards.question: 朝
meaning: reign of a sovereign or emperor
court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor

cards.question: 成语
meaning: often made up of 4 characters or two couplets of 4 characters each
often alluding to a story or historical quotation
idiom; proverb; saying; adage; set expression

cards.question: 吃亏
meaning: to get the worst of it

cards.question: 传递
meaning: to pass on to sb else

cards.question: 打工
meaning: to work a temporary or casual job
(of students) to have a job outside of class time

cards.question: 打招呼
meaning: to greet sb by word or action

cards.question: 担任
meaning: to hold a governmental office or post

cards.question: 挡
meaning: to get in the way of

cards.question: 地道
meaning: from a place known for the product

cards.question: 地区
meaning: means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture level city or county level city)

cards.question: 钓
meaning: to fish with a hook and bait

cards.question: 丁
meaning: fourth of 10 heavenly stems 十天干
letter "D" or roman "IV" in list "A, B, C"

cards.question: 顶
meaning: to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile (internet slang)

cards.question: 洞
meaning: zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)

cards.question: 对于
meaning: as far as sth is concerned

cards.question: 发挥
meaning: to bring out implicit or innate qualities

cards.question: 反正
meaning: to come over from the enemy's side

cards.question: 方
meaning: abbr. for square or cubic meter

cards.question: 分别
meaning: to part or leave each other

cards.question: 扶
meaning: to support oneself by holding onto something

cards.question: 付款
meaning: to pay a sum of money

cards.question: 鸽子
meaning: various birds of the species Columbidae

cards.question: 光临
meaning: You honor us with your presence.
It is an honor to have you.

cards.question: 甲
meaning: first of the ten heavenly stems 十天干[shí tiān gān]
(used for an unspecified person or thing)
first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)
ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)

cards.question: 接着
meaning: to go on to do sth

cards.question: 解放
meaning: refers to the Communists' victory over the Nationalists in 1949

cards.question: 可见
meaning: it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)

cards.question: 粒
meaning: classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)

cards.question: 陆地
meaning: dry land (as opposed to the sea)

cards.question: 论文
meaning: to discuss a paper or thesis (old)

cards.question: 毛
meaning: classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角, = 1, 10 yuan or 10 fen 分)

cards.question: 面积
meaning: area (of a floor, piece of land etc)

cards.question: 秒
meaning: unit of angle or arc equivalent to one sixtieth of a degree

cards.question: 名胜
meaning: a place famous for its scenery or historical relics

cards.question: 年代
meaning: a decade of a century (e.g. the Sixties)

cards.question: 念
meaning: twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿, 20)

cards.question: 宁可
meaning: one would prefer to...(or not to...)
(to pick) the lesser of two evils

cards.question: 牛仔裤
meaning: also written 牛崽褲|牛崽裤

cards.question: 盆
meaning: unit of volume equal to 12 斗 and 8 升

cards.question: 批
meaning: tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)

cards.question: 片
meaning: used with numeral 一: classifier for scenario

cards.question: 平
meaning: see also 平聲|平声[píng shēng]

cards.question: 平方
meaning: square (as in square foot, square mile, square root)

cards.question: 牵
meaning: to pull (an animal on a tether)

cards.question: 枪
meaning: thing with shape or function similar to a gun
to substitute for another person in a test

cards.question: 青
meaning: abbr. for Qinghai province 青海

cards.question: 清淡
meaning: light (of food, not greasy or strongly flavored)

cards.question: 弱
meaning: (following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than

cards.question: 舌头
meaning: enemy soldier captured for the purpose of extracting information

cards.question: 诗
meaning: abbr. for Book of Songs 詩經|诗经[Shī Jīng]

cards.question: 私人
meaning: sb with whom one has a close personal relationship

cards.question: 所
meaning: particle introducing a relative clause or passive

cards.question: 台阶
meaning: fig. way out of an embarrassing situation

cards.question: 太极拳
meaning: traditional form of physical exercise or relaxation

cards.question: 套
meaning: bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)

cards.question: 提
meaning: to carry (hanging down from the hand)

cards.question: 铜
meaning: see also 紅銅|红铜[hóng tóng]

cards.question: 退步
meaning: to do less well than before

cards.question: 委屈
meaning: to cause sb to feel wronged

cards.question: 文具
meaning: item of stationery (pen, pencil, eraser, pencil sharpener etc)

cards.question: 无奈
meaning: abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wú kě nài hé]

cards.question: 武术
meaning: military skill or technique (in former times)
all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)
tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)

cards.question: 孝顺
meaning: to be obedient to one's parents

cards.question: 行人
meaning: official responsible for arranging audiences with the emperor

cards.question: 兄弟
meaning: me (humble term used by men in public speech)

cards.question: 乙
meaning: second of 10 heavenly stems 十天干
letter "B" or roman "II" in list "A, B, C"
second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方, as opposed to 甲方)

cards.question: 应聘
meaning: to apply for an advertised position

cards.question: 与其
meaning: 與其|与其 A 不如 B (rather than A, better to B)

cards.question: 则
meaning: conjunction used to express contrast with a previous sentence or clause
classifier for written items (such as an official statement)

cards.question: 粘贴
meaning: to paste (as in cut, copy and paste)

cards.question: 掌握
meaning: to understand sth well and know how to use it

cards.question: 阵
meaning: classifier for events or states of short duration

cards.question: 整体
meaning: as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)

cards.question: 支
meaning: classifier for rods such as pens and guns
for army divisions and for songs or compositions

cards.question: 直
meaning: vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters

cards.question: 至于
meaning: to go so far as to

cards.question: 钟
meaning: time as measured in hours and minutes

cards.question: 主持
meaning: to host (a TV or radio program etc)

cards.question: 装
meaning: costume (of an actor in a play)

cards.question: 资源
meaning: natural resource (such as water or minerals)

cards.question: 紫
meaning: Lithospermum erythrorhizon (flowering plant whose root provides red purple dye)

cards.question: 自豪
meaning: to be proud of sth (in a good way)
